gpt_researcher.master.prompts.generate_search_queries_prompt (str question, str parent_query, str report_type, int max_iterations = 3 )
Generates the search queries prompt for the given question. Args: question (str): The question to generate the search queries prompt for parent_query (str): The main question (only relevant for detailed reports) report_type (str): The report type max_iterations (int): The maximum number of search queries to generate
Returns: str: The search queries prompt for the given question
